description: Basic metrics for your app on Fly.io

panels.description: Servers have a limit on how many TLS handshakes they will process concurrently per servername indicator. When this limit is reached, we queue handshakes up to a point. This chart shows how often the limit was reached during an interval.
panels.title: SNI limit reached

panels.description: Servers have a limit on how many TLS handshakes they will process concurrently per IP block. When this limit is reached, we queue handshakes up to a point. This chart shows how often the limit was reached during an interval.
panels.title: IP limit reached

title: Fly App Dashboard
